data.title: Robert Sheckley – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Robert Sheckley. Browse Robert Sheckley’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.

What a Man Believes

By: Robert Sheckley

Narrated by: Mike Vendetti

Length: 18 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

Sheckley's satirical humor shines through as Edward Moran Archer previews the different levels of hell, from the mundane to the outrageous. Each punishment is tailored to fit the individual's sins, and Archer quickly realizes the gravity of his choices.
